author: Willy
content: @Jean-Pierre Declemy. My infection was from someone from Boston breaking quarantine last Febraury. All of the family has had it and recovered. Even father in law whom is 93 survived it.

author: Phil
content:
William,

I worked in 18-countries and never got sick once. It’s what you eat and drink!

author: William Allan Sheppard Smith
content:
I had a co-worker who went on two cruises a year for multiple years and he came home, every single time, with cramps and the runs. Every single trip. He and his wife still swear by them.

I don’t know if they still go on the cruises as I have been retired for years now and not kept in touch.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: Was there words something like “The health and safety of our customers and staff is of great importance to us” in the corporate bullshit?

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
@Willy
Hope you and those around you are not being hit too badly. Get well soon.

author: Willy
content: You can be negative at the start. Yet it doesnt mean your not infected. It took 3 days for it to hit me.

author: Phil
content:
Trying to save/make money will cost people their lives!

Idiots!!!

author: Peter Wright
content:
Seadream.

End of current story by a captain who did it all to the “T.”
